Breaking Cat News by Georgia Dunn for March 27, 2017

March 26, 2017
March 28, 2017

Featured Comment

Hide All Comments Show All Comments
  1. Georgia Dunn creator almost 2 years ago

    Thank you so, so much everyone for all of your kind words!!! This has been an amazing day, and I am happily overwhelmed with everyone’s excitement!!!

    To folks who are worried about losing the longer stories—I hear you, I completely get that worry. Even people who are excited, you may also feel a little worried seeing changes or maybe expecting a series of one-offs forever now.

    No. I promise, you ain’t seen nothing yet! I grew up on ‘Peanuts’ and ‘Calvin and Hobbes.’ This is one of the best mediums there is for hilarious, heartfelt extended stories.

    I’ve here to do two things—drink tea and write awesome comics. AND I’M ALL OUT OF… Oh, never mind, the Man just put on another kettle.

    But seriously… I’m here to do this right, and I’m not going to let you down. Long time readers, remember when months into the original run I sprung the first Christmas special on everyone? And everyone freaked out, and was so surprised an ongoing story was happening? And the comments flooded in: ‘What are these feelings?!’ ‘What is happening?!’ ‘Why do I suddenly care so much about fictional cats?!!’

    Well, look at it this way: I’m about to do that to the entire country. And you’re in on it this time!

    I promise: This is going to be awesome.

    I am crazy exited for all of this!! I’m writing into August right now, and I’m already pretty much dying to share all of it with you. I cannot wait!

  1. Robin Harwood  almost 2 years ago

    Still the boys we love. The line is a bit harder, and the colours less subtle, but that is what is needed for newspaper reproduction. I’m going to miss the complex backgrounds, though.
